titleInfo.title: Faith development and a way beyond fundamentalism
Faith based radicalism: Christianity, Islam and Judaism between constructive activism and destructive fanaticism

bibliographicCitation.apa: Streib, H. (2007). Faith development and a way beyond fundamentalism. In T. Christiane, H. Dirk, M. Sara, N. Walter, & van H. Bruxelles [u.a.]: Lang.
